samples.commui
Class TermsView

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.View
      samples.commui.CommunityView
          samples.commui.Dialog
              samples.commui.TermsView
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsyncCommandListener, EventListener
public class TermsView
extends Dialog
implements AsyncCommandListener

This screen shows SNAP terms-and-conditions text and waits for user's acceptance and/or rejection of the terms. Upon acceptance, a new user account creation request is submitted to the SNAP servers. Upon rejection, the user is returned to the main LoginView screen.

commandCompleted

public boolean commandCompleted(java.lang.String cmd,
                                java.lang.String errorMessage,
                                int errorCode,
                                com.nokia.sm.net.ItemList results)
Handles the results of SNAP calls, both successes and error conditions. Throws up error dialogs for error conditions. Upon success:
  • createUser: tries to log in user with extendedLogin
  • extendedLogin: exits app w/ successful login condition

Specified by:
commandCompleted in interface AsyncCommandListener
Parameters:
cmd - Name of command attempted
errorMessage - Text of error message, if there is an error (null if not)
results - Results of command, if successful
